item.title: Projects
item.description:
My Projects

Welcome to my projects page! I know what you’re thinking – where the heck are they? Those two kids I mentioned are taking up most of my time outside of 9-5 right now, so nothing is live at the moment. A few things in the pipeline that should be up end of February so come back then!

item.title: Mother's Day @ The Dolan-Delorme's
item.description:
Join us in celebrating all the wonderful mothers in our lives! This Mother’s Day, we’re hosting a special event filled with love, appreciation, and joy.

Event Details

  • Date: Sunday, May 12th, 2024
  • Time: 11:00 AM - 2:00 PM - **Location**: EXAMPLE ADDRESS

About the Event

We have planned a delightful celebration that includes:

  • Brunch buffet with fresh, seasonal dishes
  • Live music performance
  • Flower arranging workshop
  • Professional family photo opportunities
  • Special gift for all mothers

Make this Mother’s Day unforgettable by joining us for this heartwarming celebration.
